updates.description:
First (beta) version (16 April 2020):

This is the first version of the Secret Roles Bot, which is out in beta for testing.

The bot has many features implemented in the Codenames Bot including logging of issues and channels to prevent repeated welcome messages and more.

You can find more information about this Bot and my upcoming new Discord Bots at my new site:

https://eclectic-matt.github.io/Isolation-Bots/
